name: Donnelly & Suess, Inc. v. Lilley, Appellant

judges: Before Jones, C. J., Musmanno, Jones and Cohen, JJ.
parties: Donnelly & Suess, Inc. v. Lilley, Appellant.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
Judgment affirmed on the opinion of President Judge Knight reported at 12 Pa. D. & C. 2d 383.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: •J. B. H. Carter, with Mm Thomson F. Edwards, Federico F. Mauck, Pepper, Bodine, Frick, S (Sheets and Hamilton, and Wright, Mauck Hawes and Spencer, for appellant.
Gilbert P. High, with him High, Swartz, Childs and Roberts, and Moore, Panfil & James, for appellees.
